TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class OperationBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IOperationBehavior
public ref class OperationBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IOperationBehavior
type OperationBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 指定服务方法的本地执行行为。

span.span: Specifies the local execution behavior of a service method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指示操作在执行时具有何种操作特定的执行行为。Use the attribute to indicate what operation-specific execution behavior the operation has when executed. 若要指定服务级别的执行行为，请使用 属性。(To specify execution behavior at the service level, use the attribute.) > [!NOTE] > 也可以使用 在双工客户端应用程序中配置回调协定操作。You can also use to configure a callback contract operation in a duplex client application. 对回调操作使用它时， 属性必须为 ，否则会在运行时引发 异常。When used on a callback operation, the property must be or an exception is thrown at runtime. 属性是 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 编程模型功能，使开发人员必须实现自己的常见功能。The attribute is a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise must implement themselves. - 属性控制当服务操作完成时是否释放传递给操作的参数对象。The property controls whether parameter objects passed to an operation are disposed when the operation completes. - 属性指定如果没有发生未经处理的异常，是否自动提交在其中执行方法的事务。The property specifies whether the transaction in which the method executes is automatically committed if no unhandled exceptions occur. - 属性指定是否必须在事务内执行方法。The property specifies whether a method must execute within a transaction. - 属性指定服务操作是可以、必须还是无法模拟调用方的标识。The property specifies whether the service operation can, must, or cannot impersonate the caller's identity. - 属性指定在调用方法过程中回收服务对象的时间。The property specifies when service objects are recycled during the method invocation process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在强制的分布式事务中执行的操作。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 属性指示方法在调用方的事务下执行， 属性指示在没有发生未经处理的异常时，将自动提交事务。The property indicates that the method executes under the caller's transaction and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction commits automatically. 如果确实出现未经处理的异常，则中止此事务。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数会使用下列默认值创建该类的实例：The default constructor creates an instance of the class with the following defaults: - 属性为 `true`。The property is `true`. - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. - 属性为 。The property is . - 为 。The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoDisposeParameters { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoDisposeParameters : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置是否自动释放参数。

span.span: Gets or sets whether parameters are to be automatically disposed.

value.span: 如果自动释放参数，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the parameters are to be automatically disposed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定服务是否释放在处理消息的过程中创建的所有可释放参数（输入、输出或引用参数）。This property determines whether the service disposes all disposable parameters (input, output or reference parameters) that were created while processing a message. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`. 若要阻止系统释放资源并根据需要缓存资源，请将此属性设置为 `false`。Set this property to `false` if you want to prevent the system from disposing of resources and cache them if required. 例如，如果 为 `false`，则发送方负责在发送端关闭流。For example, if is `false`, then the sender is responsible for closing the stream on the sending side.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption Impersonation { System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ImpersonationOption value); };
member this.Impersonation : System.ServiceModel.ImpersonationOption with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示操作支持的调用方模拟级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the level of caller impersonation that the operation supports.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性（外加支持模拟的绑定配置）可以使指定的方法（通过将 属性设置为 或 进行标记的方法）在调用方的标识下执行。Use the property (together with a binding configuration that supports impersonation) to enable specified methods (those marked with the property set to or ) to execute under the caller's identity. 有关详细信息，包括使用时如何执行模拟连同属性，请参阅[委托和模拟](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md)和[如何： 模拟服务上的客户端](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-impersonate-a-client-on-a-service.md).For details, including how impersonation is performed when using together with the property, see [Delegation and Impersonation](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/delegation-and-impersonation-with-wcf.md) and [How to: Impersonate a Client on a Service](~/docs/framework/wcf/how-to-impersonate-a-client-on-a-service.md). > [!NOTE] > 当以编程方式添加执行模拟的服务终结点时，必须使用 方法之一或 方法，才能将协定正确地加载到新的 对象。When programmatically adding a service endpoint that performs impersonation, you must either use one of the methods or the method to properly load the contract into a new object. 使用配置文件无需额外步骤。Using a configuration file requires no extra step. 对于不支持模拟的情况，可能有特定的方案。There may be specific scenarios when impersonation is not supported. 有关详细信息，请参阅[不支持的方案](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md)。For more information, see [Unsupported Scenarios](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/unsupported-scenarios.md). ## Examples 下面的服务代码示例要求通过将 属性设置为 来进行模拟。The following service code example requires impersonation by setting the property to . [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/vb/services.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用需要使用客户端应用程序凭据进行模拟的操作之前使用 属性来设置那些凭据。The following code example shows using the property to set the client application credentials prior to invoking the operation that requires those credentials for impersonation. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/cs/client.cs#3)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Impersonation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_impersonation/vb/client.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode ReleaseInstanceMode { System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::ReleaseInstanceMode value); };
member this.ReleaseInstanceMode : System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在调用操作过程中回收服务对象的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when in the course of an operation invocation to recycle the service object.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 时回收服务对象在执行方法的过程中。Use the property to specify when Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) recycles a service object in the course of executing a method. 默认行为是根据 值来回收服务对象。The default behavior is to recycle a service object according to the value. 通过设置 属性，可以更改该默认行为。Setting the property changes that default behavior. 不提供线程保证。The makes no threading guarantees. 如果在服务运行时必须有一个新的未修改对象，请将 属性设置为 。If you must have a new, unmodified object when your service runs, set the property to . 在事务处理方案中，通常会使用 属性来确保在调用方法之前已清除与服务对象关联的旧数据。In transaction scenarios, the property is often used to ensure that old data associated with the service object is cleaned up prior to processing a method call. 也可以通过将 属性设置为 `true` 来确保在成功完成事务后回收与事务关联的服务对象。You can also ensure that service objects associated with transactions are recycled after the transaction successfully completes by setting the property to `true`. 可以选择下列行为：You can choose the following behaviors: - 在调用操作之前回收服务对象。Recycle a service object before an operation is called. - 在调用操作之后回收服务对象。Recycle a service object after an operation is called. - 在调用操作之前和之后均回收服务对象。Recycle a service object both before and after an operation is called. - 无回收行为。No recycling behavior. 也可以使用 在双工客户端应用程序中配置回调协定操作。You can also use to configure a callback contract operation in a duplex client application. 对回调操作使用它时， 属性必须为 ，否则会在运行时引发 异常。When used on a callback operation, the property must be or an exception is thrown at runtime. 此外，一定要了解如果服务是通过将服务对象传递给 构造函数来创建的，则会按照此属性的值为 来进行处理。In addition, it is important to realize that if the service is created by passing a service object to the constructor, the value of this property is treated as if it were . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在调用之前和之后均回收服务对象。The following example code shows the use of to recycle service objects both before and after a call. [!code-csharp[OBA.ReleaseInstanceMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/oba.releaseinstancemode/cs/services.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OBA.ReleaseInstanceMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/oba.releaseinstancemode/vb/services.vb#1)]

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionAutoComplete { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TransactionAutoComplete : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如果没有发生未经处理的异常，是否自动完成当前的事务范围。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to automatically complete the current transaction scope if no unhandled exceptions occur.

value.span: 如果在成功执行操作后自动完成事务范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to complete the transaction scope automatically on successful execution of the operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为 `false`，可以直接在操作代码中完成或中止事务。Set the property to `false` to complete or abort transactions directly in the code for the operation. 在操作过程中，可能会引发已处理的异常，而不会自动中止事务。Handled exceptions can be thrown in the course of the operation without automatically aborting the transaction. 只有未经处理的异常才会触发自动中止。Only unhandled exceptions trigger an automatic abort. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在强制的分布式事务中执行的操作。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 属性指示操作在事务范围下执行， 属性指示在没有发生未经处理的异常时，将自动完成事务范围。The property indicates that the operation executes under a transaction scope and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction scope is completed automatically. 如果确实出现未经处理的异常，则中止此事务。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionScopeRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TransactionScopeRequired : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示方法在执行时是否需要事务范围。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the method requires a transaction scope for its execution.

value.span: 如果方法需要事务范围才能执行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method requires a transaction scope to execute; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 `true`，可以要求操作在事务范围内执行。Set the to `true` to require your operation to execute within a transaction scope. 如果流事务可用，则操作会在该事务内执行。If a flowed transaction is available, the operation executes within that transaction. 如果流事务不可用，则会创建一个新事务并使用它来执行操作。If one is not available, a new transaction is created and used for the operation execution. 终结点中指定的绑定可以控制是否支持流事务。The binding specified in the endpoint controls whether flowed transactions are supported. 因此，若要获取正确的行为，您必须理解绑定是否允许事务流和 属性之间的相互影响。Therefore, to obtain the proper behavior you must understand the interaction between whether transaction flow is permitted by the binding and the property. 下表显示可能的行为。The following table shows the possible behavior. |TransactionScopeRequiredTransactionScopeRequired|绑定允许事务流Binding permits transaction flow|调用方对事务进行流处理Caller flows transaction|结果Result| |-|-|-|-| |FalseFalse|FalseFalse|否No|方法在没有事务的情况下执行。Method executes without a transaction.| |TrueTrue|FalseFalse|否No|方法创建一个新事务，并在该事务内执行。Method creates and executes within a new transaction.| |True 或 FalseTrue or False|FalseFalse|是Yes|事务标头返回 SOAP 错误。A SOAP fault is returned for the transaction header.| |FalseFalse|TrueTrue|是Yes|方法在没有事务的情况下执行。Method executes without a transaction.| |TrueTrue|TrueTrue|是Yes|方法在流事务下执行。Method executes under the flowed transaction.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在强制的分布式事务中执行的操作。The following code example shows an operation that executes within a mandatory distributed transaction. 属性指示操作在事务范围下执行， 属性指示在没有发生未经处理的异常时，将自动完成事务范围。The property indicates that the operation executes under a transaction scope and the property indicates that if no unhandled exceptions occur, the transaction scope is completed automatically. 如果确实出现未经处理的异常，则中止此事务。If an unhandled exception does occur, the transaction is aborted. [!code-csharp[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/cs/services.cs#2)] [!code-vb[OperationBehaviorAttribute_Transaction#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/operationbehaviorattribute_transaction/vb/services.vb#2)]
